Home Blog About GitHub

pwnthem0le is a Turin-based, hacking students group born out of CyberChallenge 2018. Read more about us!

About

pwnthem0le is a group of cybersec entusiasts formed after the members participated in the CyberChallenge.IT 2018, at Politecnico di Torino. We are studying and training to improve our h4x0r5 ( :D ) skillz, research in the field, and be competitive in the CTF landscape. Also, we hare having LOADS of fun.

Check our CTF activity @ CTFTime :)

Contact us at pwnthem0le@gmail.com
Explore our work on GitHub
